remarks: Diagonal monoid homomorphism into a structure power.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 12-Mar-2015.)
statement:
pwsdiagmhm.y $e |- Y = ( R ^s I ) $.
pwsdiagmhm.b $e |- B = ( Base ` R ) $.
pwsdiagmhm.f $e |- F = ( x e. B |-> ( I X. { x } ) ) $.
pwsdiagmhm $p |- ( ( R e. Mnd /\ I e. W ) -> F e. ( R MndHom Y ) ) $.
$d B x $.
$d I x $.
$d R x $.
$d W x $.
$d Y x $.
